steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"830vu","text":"Add 1:500 linear acrylamide instead of carrier RNA to Buffer AVL.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2n0aj","text":"Use 280 μl of the filtrate as starting material for the Qiagen Viral RNA Mini Kit.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e10jt","text":"Pipet 1120 μL prepared Buffer AVL into a 2 mL Eppendorf tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"575pg","text":"Add 280 μL of sample into the tube containing Buffer AVL. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"co3ao","text":"Incubate at room temperature for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4jdc0","text":"Briefly centrifuge the tube to remove drops from the inside of the lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"56tia","text":"Add 1120 μL 100% ethanol to the sample, and mix by pulse-vortexing for 15 s. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"fh3cv","text":"Mix by pulse-vortexing for 15 s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b385r","text":"After mixing, briefly centrifuge the tube to remove drops from inside the lid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b1khu","text":"Carefully apply 630 μL of the lysate to the QIAamp Mini column without wetting the rim. Close the cap, and centrifuge at 6000 x g for 1 min. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3nqo2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e4ldr","text":"Place the QIAamp Mini column into a clean 2 mL collection tube, and discard the tube containing the filtrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gta7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fd1ru","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ep1nt","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5dro6","text":"If some lysate does not pass through the membrane after the initial spin, repeat the spin until it has completely flowed through.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"0784E99CD4694C4AB8B5CC75C1499C65"}}}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"89j4b","text":"Repeat the previous step until all of the lysate has been added to the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8vjm8","text":"Carefully open the QIAamp Mini column, and add 500 μL Buffer AW1. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7s05g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c8rcd","text":"Place the QIAamp Mini column in a clean 2 mL collection tube, and discard the tube containing the filtrate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"bl912","text":"Carefully open the QIAamp Mini column, and add 500 μL Buffer AW2. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5qjnr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di0ql","text":"Close the cap and centrifuge at 16,000 x g  for 3 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"2kjgh","text":"Place the QIAamp Mini column in a new 2 mL collection tube, and discard the old collection tube with the filtrate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"83nk2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bm416","text":"Centrifuge at 16,000 x g for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"5n4bs","text":"Place the QIAamp Mini column in a clean 1.5 mL microcentrifuge tube. Discard the old collection tube containing the filtrate. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9620o","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"corcj","text":"Carefully open the QIAamp Mini column and add 50 μL Buffer AVE equilibrated to room temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7kc37","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"78s43","text":"Close the cap, and incubate at room temperature for 1 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA extraction with QIAamp Viral RNA Mini Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"eur0v","text":"Centrifuge at 6000 x g (8000 rpm) for 1 min to collect eluate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"ant6j","text":"Mix 50 μL eluate with  100 μL of RNA Binding Buffer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1747c","text":"Add and mix in 150 μL of 100% ethanol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"aeru4","text":"Transfer the sample to the Zymo-Spin IC Column3 in a CollectionTube and centrifuge. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"39hre","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b0m08","text":"Discard the flow-through","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7m66d","text":"Add 400 μl RNA Wash Buffer to the column, centrifuge and discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5h64b","text":"Make up a DNase I Reaction Mix for each sample to be treated:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4ffrs","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"fepm7","text":"Component                           Volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ban2t","text":"DNase I                            ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":34,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ed7rq","text":"DNA Digestion Buffer     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"abb69","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"35","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"diaj3","text":"Add 40 μl of DNase I Reaction Mix directly into column matrix and incubate at room temperature for 15 minutes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8p0pa","text":"Add 700 μl RNA Wash Buffer to the column and centrifuge. Discard the flow-through.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fkkad","text":"Add 400 μl RNA Wash Buffer to the column and centrifuge for 1 minute ensure complete removal of the wash buffer. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8oljb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"51r4n","text":"Carefully, transfer the column into a RNase-free tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"17aui","text":"Add 10 μl DNase/RNase-Free Water directly to the column matrix and centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5auf7","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1fsva","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9uiap","text":"Pause point: store RNA at -20C","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"8E3D78EA8D764529A871318FD79190A5"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4fbsu","text":"Prepare RT reaction master mix. Per sample volumes:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4tk6g","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6bn4i","text":"Component                             Volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":44}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2adkg","text":"DNase I treated RNA        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"26mdp","text":"dNTP 10mM                      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":30,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"effo9","text":"SISPA-A primer 40uM      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"81ptl","text":"Nuclease-free water        ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":26,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dmh2p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"6","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"21tuk","text":"Incubate at 65C for 5min and then on ice for 1 min","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"eabn9","text":"Mix and briefly centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"fuli9","text":"Pre-warm the 5x SSIV buffer to RT. Vortex and briefly centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"50qii","text":"Add 1ul of 10x NEB buffer 2 to the RT product.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5fp6p","text":"Incubate at 95C for 3 min and then one ice for 1min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"7tc3f","text":"Add 0.5ul of Klenow fragment to the mixture.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"68hbn","text":"Incubate at 37C for 1 h and then at 75C for 15 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"3394s","text":"Prepare the AMPure XP beads for use; resuspend by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f421l","text":"Transfer the cDNA sample to a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a972i","text":"Add 11 μl of resuspended AMPure XP beads to the cDNA samples and mix by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"30mdh","text":"Incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"d4i83","text":"Prepare 500 μl of fresh 70% ethanol in nuclease-free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4oc1e","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"ekh6e","text":"Keep on magnet, wash beads with 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% ethanol without disturbing the pellet. Remove the 70% ethanol using a pipette and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cbv8h","text":"Repeat the previous step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f3u7s","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual ethanol. Allow to dry for 3 min, but do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"er1u6","text":"Remove the tube from the magnetic rack and resuspend pellet in 10 μl nuclease-free water. Incubate for 2 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"111g5","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colourless.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"kqd2","text":"Remove and retain 10 μl of eluate into a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d0vdv","text":"Setup PCR master mix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6agfh","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aifqk","text":"Component                                    Volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":51}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"735n6","text":"2x LongAmp PCR buffer       ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":27,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"hg4q","text":"SISPA-B primer 10 uM             ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":32,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"b2tk3","text":"Nuclease-free water               ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":33,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"961du","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6kopk","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7jjpb","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"12.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"b44rb","text":"Mastermix should be made up and aliquoted into PCR tubes in a mastermix cabinet. Cabinet and tubes should be cleaned with decontamination wipes/70% ethanol and UV sterilised before and after use.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"DC793B552AA848E6874E505082EB7F26"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4pf1l","text":"Program the following PCR cycles into the thermal cycler.\n","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9quj6","text":"Step                                                   Temperature                 Time                        Cycles","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":117}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ep3in","text":"Inital Denaturation                         95C                    3 min                        1                ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"df2ll","text":"Denaturation                                  95C                      15 s                       20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8gga7","text":"Annealing                                       50C                      30 s                       20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hukr","text":"Extension                                       65C                      50 s                       20","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7hn8","text":"Final Extension                              65C                     5 min                        1","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8cknk","text":"Prepare the AMPure XP beads for use; resuspend by vortexing.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"gtks","text":"Transfer the DNA sample to a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"f16vn","text":"Add 25 μl of resuspended AMPure XP beads to the PCR product and mix by pipetting up and down.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"5icfg","text":"Incubate for 5 minutes at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1sgb3","text":"Prepare 500 μl of fresh 70% ethanol in nuclease-free water.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"bbh8l","text":"Spin down the sample and pellet on a magnet. Keep the tube on the magnet, and pipette off the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a9spr","text":"Keep on magnet, wash beads with 200 μl of freshly prepared 70% ethanol without disturbing the pellet. Remove the 70% ethanol using a pipette and discard.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"df0hc","text":"Repeat the previous step.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4ea65","text":"Spin down and place the tube back on the magnet. Pipette off any residual ethanol. Allow to dry for 3 min, but do not dry the pellet to the point of cracking.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cft5c","text":"Remove the tube from the magnetic rack and resuspend pellet in 24 μl nuclease-free water. Incubate for 2 minutes at room temperature","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"792gn","text":"Pellet the beads on a magnet until the eluate is clear and colourless.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d18cd","text":"Remove and retain 24 μl of eluate into a clean 1.5 ml Eppendorf DNA LoBind tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a7o48","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4haer","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"drt08","text":"Pause point: Store samples at -20C","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"13273E26A39C4E718282C02297FA4720"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"1eim3","text":"Refer to the nanopore protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6v8r9","text":"Prepare RT mastermix:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5t528","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8pe4j","text":"Component                      Volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":37}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"al0ak","text":"5x SSIV Buffer                  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":31,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3qmnt","text":"DTT 100 mM                   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":28,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2dad5","text":"RNase Inhibitor               ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":29,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bl3lk","text":"Reverse Transcriptase   ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"4sl1j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"2","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"0.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"4c231","text":"Add 3.5ul of RT master mix to annealed RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"dft10","text":"Incubate at 42C for 10 min and then at 80C for 10 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"14cu3","text":"Bring FastSelect -rRNA HMR, FastSelect 5S/16S/23S, FastSelect FH Buffer, and Nuclease-free Water to room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1g11m","text":"For FastSelect 5S/16S/23S, incubate the tube at 37°C for 5 min, and then vortex to dissolve the precipitate.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7qeri","text":"Mix all other reagents vigorously by vortexing, and then briefly centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"5kcth","text":"Prepare depletion master mix on ice:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5ce8","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"bh9ab","text":"Component                           Volume","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":42}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c6ik0","text":"FastSelect FH Buffer      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cfrsd","text":"FastSelect -rRNA HMR    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":23,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"8ljkb","text":"FastSelect 5S/16S/23S    ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":24,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"dp63d","text":"Nuclease-free Water       ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":25,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"ul8r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"1":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"2":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}},"3":{"type":"amount","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"amount":"1.5","error":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"unit":1}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"8p0jm","text":"Add 5 ul of master mix to template RNA.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3uv42","text":"Incubation reactions as follows:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"42l6j","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7f96h","text":"1. 2 min at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"bgs2h","text":"2. 2 min at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"5gl2l","text":"3. 2 min at ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"3r6ql","text":"4. 2 min at ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":3,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"rs87","text":"5. 2 min at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":4,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cdc3h","text":"6. 2 min at ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":5,"offset":11,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"7d7fb","text":"7. 2 min at  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":6,"offset":12,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1ifip","text":"8. Hold at 4°C","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"75","unit":10}},"1":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"70","unit":10}},"2":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"65","unit":10}},"3":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"60","unit":10}},"4":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"55","unit":10}},"5":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"37","unit":10}},"6":{"type":"temperature","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"error_temperature":false,"guid":"","id":0,"label":"","scientificNotation":false,"temperature":"25","unit":10}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dg39d","text":"Add 19.5 μl QIAseq Beads (prewarmed to room temperature and mixed by vortexing) to the 15 μl reaction. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7h4mu","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1o2eh","text":"Mix thoroughly by vortexing, and then incubate for 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a7f4t","text":"Centrifuge in a table-top centrifuge until the beads are completely pelleted (~2 min).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"elfst","text":"Place the tubes/plate on a magnetic rack for 2 min. Once the solution has cleared, with the beads still on the magnetic stand, carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6evec","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"cftd0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"7ajsp","text":"Do not discard the beads, because they contain the RNA of interest.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"2A8E876D298044BD860F80865A4BEC09"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1rl5j","text":"Add 15 μl of Nuclease-free Water and 19.5 μl of QIAseq Bead Binding Buffer (prewarmed to room temperature and mixed by vortexing). Mix vigorously by vortexing, and then incubate for 5 min at room temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"doghj","text":"Centrifuge in a table-top centrifuge until the beads are completely pelleted (~2 min).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3ljkn","text":"Place the tubes/plate on a magnetic rack for 2 min. Once the solution has cleared, with the beads still on the magnetic stand, carefully remove and discard the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"96umi","text":"With the beads still on the magnetic stand, add 200 μl of 80% ethanol. Wait for 30 s.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7g771","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"945m6","text":"Carefully remove and discard the wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"at1er","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5d4eo","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fjerr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"800gj","text":"Do not discard the beads, because they contain the RNA of interest.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"6F0CB13274DE4629BB458F24F5ED368C"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3so2d","text":"Repeat the ethanol wash.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6ns0r","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7ma8a","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"2bctk","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8npfv","text":"Completely remove all traces of ethanol after this second wash. Remove the ethanol with a 200 μl pipette tip first, and then use a 10 μl pipette tip to remove any residual ethanol that will settle.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"684411103AF44712865EFEB18469738F"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7dnco","text":"With the beads still on the magnetic stand, air-dry at room temperature for 6–10 min until all liquid has evaporated but without overdrying the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9khfe","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"48ipc","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"aa126","text":"Visually inspect the pellet to confirm that it is completely dry.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"F49F95FDC7B24C1BA2C18665C2FFD602"}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"40fo9","text":"Remove the beads from the magnetic stand, and elute the RNA from the beads by adding 12 μl Nuclease-free Water. Mix well by pipetting or vortexing, and then allow the tubes to sit at room temperature for 2 min to appropriately hydrate the beads.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"3hcrr","text":"Return the tubes/plate to the magnetic rack until the solution has cleared.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"7d9qj","text":"Transfer 10 μl of the supernatant to nuclease-free tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7gksa","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ra7","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1pu9n","text":"Pause point: Samples can be store at -80C","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{},"guid":"F7924D6D3F9A4899A66F8A1D6E91DD15"}}}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"a01l","text":"Refer to sample preprocessing protocol for appropriate sample type.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
